name: Lead Dog Brewing
description: Lead Dog Brewing is one of Reno's premier craft breweries, operating out of a striking industrial space in the city's growing East 4th Street corridor. The brewery is known for its adventurous approach to brewing, producing everything from hazy IPAs and barrel-aged stouts to innovative sour ales. The taproom features an expansive outdoor patio area, perfect for enjoying Nevada's sunny weather after a round of golf.
shortDescription: Adventurous craft brewery with hazy IPAs, barrel-aged stouts, and a sprawling patio.

faqs.question: What types of beer does Lead Dog brew?
faqs.answer: Lead Dog is known for bold, experimental brews including hazy IPAs, barrel-aged stouts, fruited sours, and seasonal specialties.

faqs.question: Is Lead Dog family-friendly?
faqs.answer: Yes, the taproom welcomes families and often features food trucks on the patio.

faqs.question: How far is Lead Dog from downtown Reno hotels?
faqs.answer: Just a short 5-minute drive or rideshare from the downtown Reno casino corridor.

meta.title: Lead Dog Brewing – Reno Craft Beer | Golf The High Sierra
meta.description: Discover Lead Dog Brewing in Reno's East 4th Street corridor. Adventurous craft beers and a spacious patio perfect for golf groups.

testimonials.quote: Lead Dog Brewing has become our go-to after-golf hangout. Cold beers, good energy, and it's right in the heart of Reno. GTHS knows all the best spots.
testimonials.author: Jason S.

testimonials.quote: We ended every day of our golf trip at Lead Dog Brewing. Great selection, friendly bartenders, and the kind of place where your group can be loud and happy after a great round.
testimonials.author: Sarah W.
